Tasks.Task Description: Utilize Azure Monitor to continuously track the performance metrics of the virtual network, including latency, packet loss, and throughput. Investigate any anomalies.
Regularly audit the configurations of NSGs to ensure they align with security policies and best practices. Update rules as necessary to maintain security posture.
Check the status and configuration of virtual network peering connections to ensure they are functioning correctly and that traffic flows as expected.
Review and update route tables to ensure they reflect the current network architecture and routing requirements. Remove any obsolete routes.
Analyze network traffic patterns using Azure Network Watcher to identify any unusual activity or bottlenecks. Implement changes as necessary.
Regularly back up the configurations of virtual networks, including subnets and NSGs, to ensure quick recovery in case of misconfigurations or failures.
Conduct failover tests to ensure that redundant paths and configurations are functioning correctly and can take over in case of primary path failures.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure that the virtual network setup adheres to relevant regulations and internal security policies.
Keep all documentation related to the virtual network, including architecture diagrams, configuration details, and operational procedures, up to date.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training sessions to stay updated with new features, best practices, and security measures related to Azure Virtual Network.
